channel.title: SWAT's emote system ruins emote's?
channel.description:
Hello moparscaper's , I was adding swats emote system for my blurr client and after i made it my normal emote like dance , zombie walk etc.. was ruined it does sumthing with gs waking.. Anyone can help?? :D
And Mr.SWAT if could pl0x post me int for thoose emote's i got ruined :D

item.title: SWAT's emote system ruins emote's?
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

Well thx but i asked int’s it would be easier for meh cuz dont rlly understand…
SOz im new in emotes coding only 3 days…

Read full topic

item.title: SWAT's emote system ruins emote's?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“570fd, post:1, topic:376862”]Hello moparscaper’s ,
I was adding swats emote system for my blurr client and after i made it my normal emote like dance , zombie walk etc… was ruined it does sumthing with gs waking…
Anyone can help??

And Mr.SWAT if could pl0x post me int for thoose emote’s i got ruined :D[/quote]

Because he overwrote them. Look into packing 474/508 emotes into a 317 client via cache.(Cache packed)

You can also do items/npc’s/gfx/mapdata ect.

Read full topic
